data.title: If Montana cities were movies from the 90â€™s what would they be?
data.meta_description: If you love movies, the 90's and Montana this is the list for you. See what movies from the 90's we think each Montana city would be.
data.text:
I love movies. It does not matter the genre, I love them all- even mindless popcorn movies. Sometimes just shutting your brain off and seeing some big explosions is the best thing to do after a long day at work.

So the other night while watching a movie I got to thinking, what if Montana cities were movies from the 90s?

Why did I pick the 90s? Honestly, there is no real reason I did. Perhaps it's because I grew up in the 80s and 90s, so flicks from that decade were the movies that shaped me as I was coming of age.

I think the biggest reason I chose this era is because the 90's fall into the target age range for most of our demographics, that being you- the reader. The chance that young people have seen movies from the 70's, or old people seeing movies from 2020's is a bit lower. This way everyone gets to have fun.

Who knows, maybe I could do other decades as well. I would love to hear suggestions of what movies you think Montana cities would be for the other decades, but that is for another article.

I would also love to hear if you agree or disagree with my choices. I put a lot of time, effort and science into putting this list together. OK, that is a lie. This is just for fun so do not hate me if did not pick the right movie in your opinion for any of the cities on the list.
